column4: how do I permit showing all hidden and system files and folders in nautilus?
this DVD isn't just made up of 5 < 100KB files ;)
not in the *nix definition of "hidden file"
then you're probably look for .DS_Store folder
in nautilus in address bar type ".D", you should get some auto-completion
to be 100% honest, this is a mac install dvd...
then it's probably not iso-9660, or it is modified
well extracting the iso as iso-9660 produced the small files
what's the output of that command?
well, i can't help you much further, sorry. the last piece of advice is to check out acetone iso (i'm not sure if it's available in default repos, though)
